4 townships |seat_type = Municipal seat |seat = [[Heping Subdistrict, Bei'an|Heping Subdistrict]] ({{lang|zh|和平街道}}) |parts_type = |parts_style = |parts = |p1 = |p2 = |government_footnotes = |government_type = |leader_title = |leader_name = |leader_title1 = |leader_name1 = |leader_title2 = |leader_name2 = |leader_title3 = |leader_name3 = |leader_title4 = |leader_name4 = |established_title = Founded |established_date = 1910 |established_title1 = |established_date1 = |established_title2 = |established_date2 = |established_title3 = |established_date3 = |founder = |named_for = |area_footnotes = |area_total_km2 = 6313 |area_land_km2 = |area_water_km2 = |area_water_percent = |area_urban_km2 = |area_metro_km2 = |area_blank1_title = |area_blank1_km2 = |elevation_footnotes = |elevation_m = 266 |elevation_max_m = |elevation_min_m = |population_as_of = 2010 |population_footnotes = |population_note = |population_total = 436444 |population_density_km2 =auto |population_metro = |population_density_metro_km2 = |population_urban = |population_density_urban_km2 = |population_blank1_title = |population_blank1 = |population_density_blank1_km2 = |timezone = [[China Standard Time|China Standard]] |utc_offset = +8 |coordinates = {{coord|48|15|N|126|31|E|region:CN-23|display=inline}} |postal_code_type = [[Postal code of China|Postal code]] |postal_code = 164000 |area_code = 0456 |blank_name = [[Köppen climate classification|Climate]] |blank_info = [[Humid continental climate#Mild/cool summer subtype|Dwb]] |blank1_name = |blank1_info = |blank2_name = |blank2_info = |blank3_name = |blank3_info = |blank4_name = |blank4_info = |blank5_name = |blank5_info = |blank6_name = |blank6_info = |website ={{URL|www.hljba.gov.cn/}} |footnotes = }} '''Bei'an''' ({{zh|c=北安 |p=Běi'ān |l=northern peace}}) is a [[county-level city]] in west-central [[Heilongjiang]] province in the [[People's Republic of China]]. It is under the jurisdiction of [[Heihe]]. Bei'an was the provincial capital of Bei'an province of [[Manchukuo]], a puppet state set up by Japan during the [[Second World War]]. ==Administrative divisions== There are six [[Subdistrict (China)|subdistricts]], five [[Town (China)|towns]] and four [[Townships of the People's Republic of China|townships]] under the city's administration:{{cite web |url = http://www.stats.gov.cn/tjbz/cxfldm/2011/23/11/231181.html |script-title = zh:2011年统计用区划代码和城乡划分代码：北安市 |publisher = National Bureau of Statistics of the People's Republic of China |language = Chinese |accessdate = 2013-01-27 }}{{Dead link|date=October 2019 |bot=InternetArchiveBot |fix-attempted=yes }} ===Subdistricts (街道)=== *[[Heping Subdistrict, Bei'an|Heping Subdistrict]] (和平街道) *[[Zhaolin Subdistrict]] (兆麟街道) *[[Qinghua Subdistrict]] (庆华街道) *[[Tiexi Subdistrict, Bei'an|Tiexi Subdistrict]] (铁西街道) *[[Tienan Subdistrict]] (铁南街道) *[[Beigang Subdistrict, Bei'an|Beigang Subdistrict]] (北岗街道) ===Towns (镇)=== *[[Tongbei]] (通北镇) *[[Zhaoguang]] (赵光镇) *[[Shiquan, Heilongjiang|Shiquan]] (石泉镇) *[[Haixing, Heilongjiang|Haixing]] (海星镇) *[[Erjing]] (二井镇) ===Townships (乡)=== *[[Chengjiao Township, Heilongjiang|Chengjiao Township]] (城郊乡) *[[Dongsheng Township, Bei'an|Dongsheng Township]] (东胜乡) *[[Yangjia Township]] (杨家乡) *[[Zhuxing Korean Ethnic Township]] (主星朝鲜族乡) ==References== {{Reflist|colwidth=30em}} ==External links== {{Heilongjiang topics}} {{Heilongjiang}} [[Category:Cities in Heilongjiang]] {{Heilongjiang-geo-stub}}
